titleStmt.title: Mnemosyn[on kyrio-]euchariston A treatise of the supper of the Lord in commemoration of his death, and the manifolde benefits thereby receiued; wherein the monstrous transubstantiated masse idole of that seven headed inchanting whore of Rome is stampt to power, to giue al the to drink [sic], which make it their only pleasure to swill themselues in the dregs thereof: and wherein also the doctrintes & vses which arise from thence, are most soundly & sincerely delivered. By Iohn Willovghby. Exhomologesis: a praier, or generall confession or our manifold sinnes vnto the Lord.
titleStmt.author: Willoughbie, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes and are to be sold in Paules church yard at the signe of the crowne by Simon VVaterson [London],

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A preparation vnto the Lords supper.
Title page mutilated, with some loss of print. Title taken from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
